verses.verse: Now it came to pass on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that Esther <S%H635><s%> put on <S%H3847><s%> her royal <S%H4438><s%> apparel <S%H5975><s%>, and stood in the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, over against <S%H5227><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>: and the king <S%H4428><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> upon his royal <S%H4438><s%> throne <S%H3678><s%> in the royal <S%H4438><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, over against <S%H5227><s%> the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>.

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, My petition <S%H7596><s%> and my request is <S%H1246><s%>:

if I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>, and if it please <S%H2895><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> to grant <S%H5414><s%> my petition <S%H7596><s%>, and to perform <S%H6213><s%> my request <S%H1246><s%>, let the king <S%H4428><s%> and Haman <S%H2001><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to the banquet <S%H4960><s%> that I shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> for them <S%H6213><s%>, and I will do to-morrow <S%H4279><s%> as the king <S%H4428><s%> hath said <S%H1697><s%>.

Then went <S%H3318><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> joyful <S%H8056><s%> and glad <S%H2896><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>: but when Haman <S%H2001><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s gate <S%H8179><s%>, that he stood not up <S%H6965><s%> nor moved <S%H2111><s%> for him <S%H2001><s%>, he was filled <S%H4390><s%> with wrath <S%H2534><s%> against Mordecai <S%H4782><s%>.

Haman <S%H2001><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H635><s%>, Yea, Esther the queen <S%H4436><s%> did let no man come in <S%H935><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%> unto the banquet <S%H4960><s%> that she had prepared <S%H6213><s%> but myself <S%H4279><s%>; and to-morrow also am I invited <S%H7121><s%> by her together with the king <S%H4428><s%>.
